review: The stick is nice and fast.  You can get voice search through the mobile app and it works great. For the price you can't argue with this performance!

review: This is so cool! Got to get one

review: only plays music - i thought it would have "casting" functionality from laptop to tv
author: Amazon Customer

review: A totally user-friendly vehicle for watching movies and TV shows.  I just hope that Amazon is rapidly increasing its licensed materials to convert more  rents/buys to 'free goods" for Amazon Prime members.
author: CEC

review: not  for me, sending it back.  does not have the power of the Fire TV.  Keeps disconnecting

review: Extremely happy with it!!!!! I also have Chromecast, Apple TV3 but Fire stick is my favorite!

review: I got it for a present and I love it !

review: This is awesome. Now, I can watch my entire watchlist on TV. The price was just right for it, and the installation and set up took less than 10 minutes.

review: Awesome this works great  fixed all the short comings the chrome cast left
